PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

Source: R/panther.R
panther.Rd

PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

panther(organism, release = NULL)

Arguments

organism

string. Supported organisms:

  • Homo sapiens

  • Mus musculus

  • Caenorhabditis elegans

  • Drosophila melanogaster
release

string or NULL. PANTHER release version. If set NULL, defaults to current release. Consult the PANTHER website for a list of release versions available from the FTP server (e.g. "13.0").

Value

DataFrame.

See also

Other Annotation Functions: broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, eggnog, emptyRanges, geneSynonyms, hgnc2gene, makeGRanges, makeGene2symbol, makeTx2gene, mgi2gene, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

invisible(capture.output(
    x <- panther("Homo sapiens")
))
#> Downloading PANTHER annotations for Homo sapiens (current_release)
#> Skipping PTHR13.1_human.gz
#> All files have already downloaded
#> Obtaining HGNC to Ensembl gene ID mappings
#> Splitting and sorting the GO terms
#> goMF
#> goBP
#> goCC
#> pantherClass
#> pantherPathway
glimpse(x)
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:19670] "ENSG00000000003" "ENSG00000000005" "ENSG00000000419" "ENSG00000000457" ...
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 19670

#>   .. ..$ geneID              : chr [1:19670] "ENSG00000000003" "ENSG00000000005" "ENSG00000000419" "ENSG00000000457" ...
#>   .. ..$ pantherSubfamily    : chr [1:19670] "PTHR19282:SF169" "PTHR14064:SF3" "PTHR43398:SF1" "PTHR12984:SF15" ...
#>   .. ..$ pantherFamilyName   : chr [1:19670] "TETRASPANIN" "CHONDROMODULIN-RELATED" "FAMILY NOT NAMED" "SCY1-RELATED S/T PROTEIN KINASE-LIKE" ...
#>   .. ..$ pantherSubfamilyName: chr [1:19670] "TETRASPANIN-6" "TENOMODULIN" "DOLICHOL-PHOSPHATE MANNOSYLTRANSFERASE SUBUNIT 1" "PROTEIN-ASSOCIATING WITH THE CARBOXYL-TERMINAL DOMAIN OF EZRIN" ...

#>   .. ..$ goBP                :List of 19670
#>   .. ..$ goCC                :List of 19670

#>   .. ..$ pantherPathway      :List of 19670
